title: 1.11.4 regression: t4l dies at startup
body:
**Describe the bug**
Since the upgrade to version 1.11.4 teams-for-linux dies at startup:
```
{hdunkel@dpcl082:aixigo 09:41:51 (master) 1103} teams-for-linux --trace-warnings --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
all good with appLogLevels you aren't using them
all good with onlineCheckMethod you aren't using them
Initialising logger with config: "{}"
09:41:58.649  File logging at /home/hdunkel/.config/teams-for-linux/logs/main.log with level silly
09:41:58.651  Console logging enabled with level silly
09:41:58.652  Logger initialised
09:41:58.653  configPath: /home/hdunkel/.config/teams-for-linux
09:41:58.653  configFile: { appIcon: '/usr/share/icons/hicolor/48x48/apps/teams-for-linux.png' }
09:41:58.840  (node:324415) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: ReferenceError: config is not defined
    at BrowserWindowManager.createNewBrowserWindow (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/browserWindowManager.js:56:20)
    at BrowserWindowManager.createWindow (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/browserWindowManager.js:31:28)
    at Object.onAppReady (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/index.js:43:38)
    at App.handleAppReady (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/index.js:246:16)
    at App.emit (node:events:531:35)
    at emitUnhandledRejectionWarning (node:internal/process/promises:298:15)
    at warnWithErrorCodeUnhandledRejectionsMode (node:internal/process/promises:406:5)
    at processPromiseRejections (node:internal/process/promises:470:17)
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:96:32)
09:41:58.841  (node:324415) ReferenceError: config is not defined
    at BrowserWindowManager.createNewBrowserWindow (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/browserWindowManager.js:56:20)
    at BrowserWindowManager.createWindow (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/browserWindowManager.js:31:28)
    at Object.onAppReady (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/index.js:43:38)
    at App.handleAppReady (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/index.js:246:16)
    at App.emit (node:events:531:35)
[324517:1110/094158.893056:ERROR:viz_main_impl.cc(181)] Exiting GPU process due to errors during initialization
```
After moving back to 1.11.3 the problem is gone.

Verified on Debian 12 and Sid.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - Debian 12
 - Installation package deb
 - 1.11.4
